TopicTitle: bug 1.0.2 : No getting science point when transmitting

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I just ask if someone have observed this bug.

I precise I play on a 64bit-Linux version without ModuleManager modes or mode which modify the science or antenna comportment ( list of mode below)

When I try to "transmit" anything, I have the "percent" going to 100%, the "transmit done" message, but no "science point" obtain. ( maned pod or prob core...)

I'm observed this on Career and "science" game

I have the only one who observed this ?

Thanks

DrDam

Situation

end of transmission

List of modes :

ActiveTextureManagement

Chatterer

DistantObject

KerbalEngineer

KSP-AVC

NavBallDockingAlignmentIndicatore

NavHud

FinalFrontier

ScienceAlert

StageRecovery

AlternateRessourcePanel

TransferWindowPlanner

I had the problem as well. It goes away if i quit to space center than return to my craft.

I thought it was a problem with RemoteTech, however, it might be a problem with ScienceAlert (it's the only relevant mod you and I share in common).

Thanks.

I disable ScienceAlert, and it's work normally.

Thanks
Hi, there was a bug in ScienceAlert 1.8.5 that prevented science transmission from working correctly. Please make sure you're running 1.8.7
thanks for the update Evilreeperx! will update, great work on the mod
